history.proof: intros t. induction t. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall t : Term, LNN2LNT_term (LNT2LNN_term t) = t

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
LNT2LNN_term = fix LNT2LNN_term (t : Term) : fol.Term LNN := match t with | @fol.var _ v => fol.var LNN v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNN f (LNT2LNN_terms (arity LNT (inr f)) ts) end with LNT2LNN_terms (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) {struct ts} : fol.Terms LNN n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (fol.Terms LNN n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNN | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNN m (LNT2LNN_term s) (LNT2LNN_terms m ss) end for LNT2LNN_term : Term -> fol.Term LNN
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term
LNN2LNT_freeVarTerm : forall t : fol.Term LNN, freeVarTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) = freeVarTerm LNN t
LNN2LNT_subTerm : forall (t : fol.Term LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), LNN2LNT_term (substituteTerm LNN t v s) = substituteTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) v (LNN2LNT_term s)
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
LNN2LNT_natToTerm : forall n : nat, LNN2LNT_term (natToTermLNN n) = natToTerm n

freeVarTimes : forall x y : Term, freeVarTerm LNT (Times x y) = freeVarTerm LNT x ++ freeVarTerm LNT y

Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (fol.impH L f...
translateLT = fun ts : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => let s := consTerms LNN 1 ts in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 | Tcons LNN 1 (fst t) (snd t) = ts} => Formula) (fun (x : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1) (p : Tcons LNN 1 (fst x) (snd x) = ts) => prod_rec (fun x0 : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 => Tcons LNN 1 (fst x0) (snd x0) = ts -> Formula) (fun (a : fol.Term LNN) (b : fol.Terms LNN 1) (_ : Tcons LNN 1 (fst (a, b)) (snd (a, b)) = ts) => let s0 := consTerms LNN 0 b in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term LNN * fol.Ter...
LNT2LNN_formula = fix LNT2LNN_formula (f : Formula) : fol.Formula LNN := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => fol.equal LNN (LNT2LNN_term t1) (LNT2LNN_term t2) | @atomic _ r _ => match r return (fol.Formula LNN) with end | @fol.impH _ A B => fol.impH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) (LNT2LNN_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => fol.notH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => fol.forallH LNN v (LNT2LNN_formula A) end : Formula -> fol.Formula LNN
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t)
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
folLogic.forallE : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)
folLogic.existI : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f)
BinPos.Dcompare : forall r : comparison, r = Eq \/ r = Lt \/ r = Gt
CompOpp_inj : forall c c' : comparison, CompOpp c = CompOpp c' -> c = c'
beq_nat_true : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true -> n = m
BinInt.Z.eq_mul_0 : forall n m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.mul n m = BinNums.Z0 < -> n = BinNums.Z0 \/ m = BinNums.Z0
inj_right_pair2 : forall A : Set, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : A -> Set) (y y' : P x), existT P x y = existT P x y' -> y = y'
Znat.Zabs2N.id : forall n : BinNums.N, BinInt.Z.abs_N (BinInt.Z.of_N n) = n
Znat.Zabs2Nat.id : forall n : nat, BinInt.Z.abs_nat (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) = n
Nnat.Nat2N.id : forall n : nat, BinNat.N.to_nat (BinNat.N.of_nat n) = n
BinNat.N.sub_0_r : forall n : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.sub n BinNums.N0 = n
Nat.max_0_r : forall n : nat, Nat.max n 0 = n
max_0_r : forall n : nat, Nat.max n 0 = n
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : Fin.t m) (q : Fin.t n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
formula_dec : forall L : Language, language_decideable L -> forall x y : fol.Formula L, {x = y} + {x <> y}
Znat.Zabs_N_nat : forall n : BinNums.Z, BinNat.N.to_nat (BinInt.Z.abs_N n) = BinInt.Z.abs_nat n
LNT2LNN_natToTerm : forall n : nat, LNT2LNN_term (natToTerm n) = natToTermLNN n
Znat.nat_N_Z : forall n : nat, BinInt.Z.of_N (BinNat.N.of_nat n) = BinInt.Z.of_nat n
nilTerms : forall (L : Language) (x : fol.Terms L 0), Tnil L = x
app_nil_end : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l = l ++ nil

- simpl. rewrite <- IHt. reflexivity.
Qed.
